verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H7725>turn<s%> back and <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth<s%>, between <S%H4024>Migdol<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H5226>before<s%> <S%H1189>Baal-zephon<s%>: over <S%H6440>against<s%> it shall ye <S%H2583>encamp<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, They are <S%H943>entangled<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> hath shut them <S%H5462>in<s%>.

And I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and he shall <S%H7291>follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3513>them<s%>; and I will get me honor upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H2428>host<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. And they did <S%H6213>so<s%>.

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> that the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H1272>fled<s%>: and the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> was <S%H2015>changed<s%> towards the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they <S%H559>said<s%>, What is this we have <S%H6213>done<s%>, that we have let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> from serving <S%H5647>us<s%>?
And he made <S%H631>ready<s%> his <S%H7393>chariot<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> his people with <S%H5971>him<s%>:

and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and all the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and captains over all of <S%H7991>them<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5483>them<s%>, all the horses and <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, and his <S%H2428>army<s%>, and <S%H5381>overtook<s%> them <S%H2583>encamping<s%> by the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, beside <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1189>Baal-zephon<s%>.

And when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> drew <S%H7126>nigh<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H4714>and<s%>, behold, the Egyptians were <S%H5265>marching<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3966>them<s%>; and they were sore <S%H3372>afraid<s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> cried <S%H6817>out<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Because there were no <S%H6913>graves<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, hast thou taken us <S%H3947>away<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>? <S%H2063>wherefore<s%> hast thou <S%H6213>dealt<s%> thus with <S%H3318>us<s%>, to bring us forth out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>?

Is not this the <S%H1697>word<s%> that we <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Let us <S%H2308>alone<s%>, that we may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>? For it were <S%H2896>better<s%> for us to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, than that we should <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> ye <S%H3320>not<s%>, stand still, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, which he will <S%H6213>work<s%> for you <S%H3117>to-day<s%>: for the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> whom ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>, ye shall <S%H7200>see<s%> them <S%H3254>again<s%> no more <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H3898>fight<s%> for <S%H2790>you<s%>, and ye shall hold your peace.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Wherefore <S%H6817>criest<s%> thou unto <S%H1696>me<s%>? speak unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they go <S%H5265>forward<s%>.

And lift thou <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and <S%H1234>divide<s%> <S%H1121>it<s%>: and the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> on dry <S%H3004>ground<s%>.

And <S%H2388>I<s%>, behold, I will harden the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and they shall go in <S%H935>after<s%> <S%H310>them<s%>: and I will get me <S%H3513>honor<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H2428>host<s%>, upon his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and upon his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, when I have gotten me <S%H3513>honor<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, upon his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and upon his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, who <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5265>removed<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H5982>them<s%>; and the pillar of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from before <S%H6440>them<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> behind <S%H310>them<s%>:

and it <S%H935>came<s%> between the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and there was the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and the <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, yet gave it <S%H215>light<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>: and the one came not <S%H7126>near<s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> caused the <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> back by a <S%H5794>strong<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2724>dry<s%> <S%H4325>land<s%>, and the waters were <S%H1234>divided<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> upon the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H4325>ground<s%>: and the waters were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> unto them on their right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and on their <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%>, and went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, all <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5483>horses<s%>, his <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and his <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8259>looked<s%> forth upon the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> through the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> and of <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and <S%H2000>discomfited<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And he took <S%H5493>off<s%> their <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%>, and they <S%H5090>drove<s%> them <S%H3517>heavily<s%>; so that the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Let us <S%H5127>flee<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3898>fighteth<s%> for them against the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> may come <S%H7725>again<s%> upon the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, upon their <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and upon their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stretched <S%H5186>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to its <S%H386>strength<s%> when the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6437>appeared<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>; and Jehovah <S%H5287>overthrew<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

And the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and the <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>, even all the <S%H2428>host<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> that <S%H935>went<s%> in <S%H310>after<s%> them into the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not so much <S%H5704>as<s%> one of <S%H259>them<s%>.

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> upon <S%H3004>dry<s%> land in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>; and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> were a <S%H2346>wall<s%> unto them on their right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and on their <S%H8040>left<s%>.

Thus <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> upon <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>sea-shore<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3027>work<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> upon the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: and they <S%H539>believed<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
